channel.title: kubernetes on Sabuj Jana
channel.description: Recent content in kubernetes on Sabuj Jana

item.title: Kubernetes Club Ep 01: Decrypting a K8s Cluster Hands On
item.description: Starting a blog series named Kubernetes Club (Inspired by the movie Fight Club). Here I will be talking about all things k8s, Istio and their related cloud-native technologies. The episodes will be hands-on and full of diagrams so that people can follow alongside and get a feel of k8s. Also, I included memes - figured it would be a win-win. Since joining Flipkart, I have been exposed to the wonderful of Kubernetes and Istio.
